downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 White Paper: Extending Default Cubes for Virtual Companies
downloadDescription: This document describes the steps to take to configure default cubes to allow aggregation across entities when using virtual companies.
detailsSection: In Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, you can establish virtual companies to share information across multiple companies set up within one installation. However, the default cubes do not have a relationship with the Global Address Book to facilitate the aggregation across entities that is common among companies in a virtual company.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
